title: Assets, Images, and Icons
introductionEN: Manage assets, display images, and show icons.
introductionCN: 管理资产，显示图像和显示图标。

title: Async
introductionEN: Async patterns to your Flutter application.

title: Basics
introductionEN: Widgets you absolutely need to know before building your first Flutter app.
introductionCN: 在构建第一个Flutter应用程序之前，您首先需要知道的小部件。

title: Cupertino (iOS-style widgets)
introductionEN: Beautiful and high-fidelity widgets for current iOS design language.
introductionCN: 适用于当前iOS设计语言的美观且高保真的小部件。

title: Input
introductionEN: Take user input in addition to input widgets in Material Components and Cupertino.
introductionCN: 除了Material Components和Cupertino中的输入小部件之外，还可以输入用户输入。

title: Interaction Models
introductionEN: Respond to touch events and route users to different views.
introductionCN: 响应触摸事件并将用户路由到不同的视图。

title: Layout
introductionEN: Arrange other widgets columns, rows, grids, and many other layouts.
introductionCN: 排列其他小部件列，行，网格和许多其他布局。

title: Material Components
introductionEN: Visual, behavioral, and motion-rich widgets implementing the Material Design guidelines.
introductionCN: 实现Material Design准则的视觉，行为和动作丰富的小部件。

title: Painting and effects
introductionEN: These widgets apply visual effects to the children without changing their layout, size, or position.
introductionCN: 这些小部件将视觉效果应用于儿童，而不会改变其布局，大小或位置。

title: Scrolling
introductionEN: Scroll multiple widgets as children of the parent.
introductionCN: 滚动多个小部件作为父级的子级。

title: Styling
introductionEN: Manage the theme of your app, makes your app responsive to screen sizes, or add padding.
introductionCN: 管理应用的主题，使您的应用响应屏幕尺寸或添加填充。
